name: mblvol
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wceq(cfv(cvol, c0), cfv(covol, c0)))

stmt.origin: syl5eq(cfv(cvol, c0), cfv(covol, c0), cfv(cres(covol, cdm(cvol)), c0), wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)))
stmt.pretty: syl5eq((vol ` c0), (vol* ` c0), ((vol* |` dom(vol))` c0), c0 ∈ dom(vol))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wceq(cfv(cvol, c0), cfv(covol, c0)))
-| wceq(cfv(cvol, c0), cfv(cres(covol, cdm(cvol)), c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wceq(cfv(cres(covol, cdm(cvol)), c0), cfv(covol, c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ dom(vol)→(vol ` c0)=(vol* ` c0))
⊣ (vol ` c0)=((vol* |` dom(vol))` c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ dom(vol)→((vol* |` dom(vol))` c0)=(vol* ` c0))

comment: The volume of a measurable set is the same as its outer volume. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Mar-2014.)
